Package de.esoco.lib.comm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Server.RequestHandler
    Defines the interface that needs to be implemented for server request handlers.
    Server.RequestHandlerFactory
    A functional interface for the implementation of factories that create instances of Server.RequestHandler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommunicationChain<I,V,O>
    Binary function that chains a communication method with another function and still can be used as a communication method so that it can be invoked with a connection as the second evaluation argument.
    CommunicationFunctions
    Provides factory methods of communication-related functions.
    CommunicationMethod<I,O>
    Describes a method to communicate with an endpoint in the communication framework.
    CommunicationRelationTypes
    Contains standard relation type definitions for the communications framework.
    Connection
    The base class for all kinds of connections handled by the communication framework.
    Endpoint
    Describes an endpoint of a connection in the communication framework.
    EndpointFunction<I,O>
    A function that applies a CommunicationMethod to an endpoint and automatically performs the resource handling upon evaluation (i.e. closing the endpoint Connection).
    HttpEndpoint
    An endpoint that connects to an HTTP or HTTPS address and allows to perform HTTP requests.
    HttpEndpoint.HttpRequest<I,O>
    Implementation of a communication method that performs a HTTP request.
    JsonRpcEndpoint
    An endpoint that communicates via JSON RPC with a wrapped, transport-specific endpoint.
    JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatch<P,R>
    The base class for for JSON RPC requests that execute batch calls.
    JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchCall
    A batch invocation of JSON RPC methods that dispatches the responses to different consumers for each method call.
    JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchMethod<P,R>
    A JSON RPC batch call that invokes a single method multiple times with different parameters.
    JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R>
    A JSON RPC request that calls a certain RPC method.
    JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcRequest<P,R>
    The base class for communication methods that call a JSON RPC method over the actual transport endpoint.
    PipeEndpoint
    An endpoint that uses a named pipe for communication.
    PipeEndpoint.PipeRequest<I,O>
    A request method to be executed on a PipeEndpoint.
    Server
    A server that listens on a socket for requests.
    SmtpEndpoint
    A socket-based Endpoint that allows to send email to an SMTP server.
    SmtpEndpoint.SmtpRequest
    A SMTP request that sends email from instance of Email.
    SocketEndpoint
    An endpoint to an HTTP address.
    SocketEndpoint.BinaryRequest
    A socket communication method implementation that sends binary data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.
    SocketEndpoint.SocketRequest<I,O>
    A generic base class for socket communication method that sends data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.
    SocketEndpoint.TextRequest
    A socket communication method implementation that sends text data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Endpoint.UserInfoField
    Enumeration of the user info fields in a URI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CommunicationException
    The base class for all exceptions that can occur in the communications framework.
